solution_line_template: Jess needs to walk {to_store} blocks + {to_gallery} blocks + {to_work} blocks = <<{to_store}+{to_gallery}+{to_work}={total_blocks}>>{total_blocks} blocks total.
Jess needs to go {total_blocks} blocks – {already_walked} = <<{total_blocks}-{already_walked}={remaining_blocks}>>{remaining_blocks} blocks to get to work.
